starting-month.label: Starting month
starting-month.description: The first month in the generated calendar. Choose something like October if you want your calendar to cover a semester, instead of a calendar year.

month-count.label: Number of months
month-count.description: For how many months should the calendar be generated for.

month.title: Month overview
month.description: The month overview is a place to set goals for the upcoming month, track habits and more.

week.title: Week overview
week.description: Week overview gives you a zoom out of the week to makes plans easier.

retrospective.title: Week retrospective
retrospective.description: Week retrospective is a place to reflect on the past week - how it went, what did you learn, what could you improve for next week?

configuration.generation-description: PDF generation is done entirely in your browser - no data is sent to our servers!

preview.title: Calendar preview (only first month is rendered)

generating.full: Generating full calendar - this could take more than a minute...
generating.preview: Generating preview, please wait - it can take a minute.

empty.title: Use the configuration form to create your personalized calendar.
empty.subtitle: The preview will appear here.
